edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar

Class LatticeGrammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar.Grammar
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar.LatticeGrammar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GrammarInterface, Configurable

    public class LatticeGrammar
extends Grammar
    A grammar build from a lattice. Can be used for a second and subsequent passes of multi-pass recognition.

      • createGrammar

        protected GrammarNode createGrammar()
                             throws IOException
        Creates the grammar from the language model. This Grammar contains one word per grammar node. Each word (and grammar node) is connected to all other words with the given probability
        Specified by:
        createGrammar in class Grammar
        Returns:
        the initial grammar node
        Throws:
